member.name: T:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.IOpenContactsProvider
member.summary: Interface to Open Contacts provider, or other address book providers which use the same methods of managing change log info, such as Contacts Express

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.IOpenContactsProvider.GetChangeLogXml(System.DateTime)
member.summary: For change log xml from client address book

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.IOpenContactsProvider.ApplyChangeLogXml(System.String)
member.summary: Apply change log to client address book, and return localID/serverID pair
member.param: Change log XML to update local address book
member.returns: Each pair is in localID=ServerID format, separated by line break.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.IOpenContactsProvider.BeginSync(System.String)
member.summary: Obtain sync permission from local address book.
member.param: The message from sync program to local address book
member.returns: True if local address book allow to sync.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.IOpenContactsProvider.EndSync(System.String)
member.summary: Notify local address book that the sync is finished.

member.name: P:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.IOpenContactsProvider.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Get error message from the provider.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCLocalDataSource.#ctor(Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.IOpenContactsProvider,System.String)
member.summary: This is used by a client which will provider an OcProvider.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCLocalDataSource.GenerateSyncCommandsSource(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get commands source from the provider.
member.returns: Null if something wrong in the provider

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCLocalDataSource.SafeElementsQuery(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String[])
member.summary: Safely query multiple levels of Xml path. If the path could not return any element, return an empty list rather than null. This is convenient for Linq to Xml.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCLocalDataSource.ReportChangeLogContent(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Report change log's content to GUI. This is generally called before sending changes to the server.
member.param: The root element should be Changes

member.name: P:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCLocalDataSource.StyleSheetFromSifcToChangeLogXml
member.summary: File name of stylesheet to convert SIF-C to Change Log XML

member.name: P:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.OCLocalDataSource.StyleSheetFromChangeLogXmlToSifc
member.summary: File name of stylesheet to convert Change Log XML to SIF-C.

member.name: T:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.LocalDataSourceException
member.summary: Exception type for LocalDataSource assembly.

member.name: T:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.SyncMLSyncCommandsToXml
member.summary: Convert sync command to change log XML of OC

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.SyncMLSyncCommandsToXml.GenerateXml(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Fonlow.SyncML.Elements.SyncMLCommand},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generate oc change log xml from a collection of SyncML objects.
member.param: Stylesheet to transform SIF-C to change log XML.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.SyncMLSyncCommandsToXml.ExtractSifcStrings(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Fonlow.SyncML.Elements.SyncMLCommand})
member.summary: Extract from a collection of sync commands to create a list of strings. This function is generally for unit testing.
member.returns: String collection. Each string represents a sync command.

member.name: T:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands
member.summary:
Convert change SyncML from change log xml of Open Contacts to a collection of SyncML Sync Commands. Internally it will transform OCChangeLogXML into SifCChangeLogXML using a stylesheet, then navigate through each SIF-C record to create SyncMLCommand.
In order to support vCard, a derived class called XmlToSyncMLSyncCommandsForVCard is developed.

member.name: F:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.sifcChangeLogXml
member.summary: Hold Sif-C change log xml for further analysis.

member.name: F:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.xmlTransformer
member.summary: Transform OC change log xml to Sif-C change log xml.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.#ctor(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: Stylesheet file to convert the change log xml to SIF-C.
How many sync commands can be extracted each time from the internal command buffer.

member.name: F:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.commandsBuffer
member.summary: Internal commands buffers. The client will get a portion each time to send to the server.

member.name: F:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.bufferPosition
member.summary: The progress that client codes extract commands from the buffer.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.ExtractNextCommands(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Fonlow.SyncML.Elements.SyncMLCommand})
member.summary: Extract a batch of commands from commandsBuffer. The number of commands is limited by NumberOfCommandPerBatch.
member.param: External commands collection to get command items from commandsBuffer.
member.returns: Ture if more commands to emit; false if no more.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.PrepareCommands(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Fonlow.SyncML.Elements.SyncMLCommand})
member.summary: Analyze change log XML and transform to a set of commands.
member.param: External commands collection. Generally this is commandsBuffer.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.AddAddCommandsToCollection(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Fonlow.SyncML.Elements.SyncMLCommand})
member.summary: Add AddCommands from SifcChangeLogXML
member.param: The collections will be expanded, as result.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.AddReplaceCommandsToCollection(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Fonlow.SyncML.Elements.SyncMLCommand})
member.summary: Add replace commands from SifCChangeLog

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.AddContentToCommand(Fonlow.SyncML.Elements.SyncMLUpdateBase,System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Add content to a AddCommand or a ReplaceCommand, with currentNode of SifCChangeLogXML.
member.param: A C element under either New or Update element.

member.name: P:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommands.NumberOfChanges
member.summary: Total number of changes indicated by the change log XML, including added, updated and deleted ones.

member.name: M:Fonlow.SyncML.OpenContacts.XmlToSyncMLSyncCommandsForVcard.AddContentToCommand(Fonlow.SyncML.Elements.SyncMLUpdateBase,System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.param: A C element under either New or Update element.
